verses.name: Hosea 9:4
verses.text: They shall not offer wine offerings to the Lord, neither shall they be pleasing unto him: their sacrifices shall be unto them as the bread of mourners; all that eat thereof shall be polluted: for their bread for their soul shall not come into the house of the Lord.

verses.name: Hosea 9:5
verses.text: What will ye do in the solemn day, and in the day of the feast of the Lord?

verses.name: Hosea 9:6
verses.text: For, lo, they are gone because of destruction: Egypt shall gather them up, Memphis shall bury them: the pleasant places for their silver, nettles shall possess them: thorns shall be in their tabernacles.
